thread.title: Coming Distractions: Everyone’s a skeleton in the new Pirates Of The Caribbean: Dead Men Tell No Tales teaser
thread.title_full: Coming Distractions: Everyone’s a skeleton in the new Pirates Of The Caribbean: Dead Men Tell No Tales teaser

author: Sam Barsanti
title: Coming Distractions: Everyone’s a skeleton in the new Pirates Of The Caribbean: Dead Men Tell No Tales teaser
text:
Share Tweet 
It looks like Disney is jumping right out of the gate for this year’s Super Bowl teasers, first with Guardians   before the game even started and now with this Johnny Cash-backed look at Pirates Of The Caribbean: Dead Men Tell No Tales . This trailer shows a bit more of Javier Bardem’s spooky new villain (who first showed up in the last teaser ), as well as a whole bunch of skeletal animals, so it seems like this one is really going to be leaning hard on the “undead sailors” angle once again. That’s what people come to these movies for, though, isn’t it? Well, that and Johnny Depp’s dirty pirate swagger, but they’ve gotta save something for the real movie. 
Pirates Of The Caribbean: Dead Men Tell No Tales   26.
